social_link_2=”https://www.instagram.com/msichani5/”]Passionate about design, color palettes, and solving complex problems, MJ approaches every project with intense detail and precision. He leads with a focus on strategic branding and a keen eye fixed on searching for improvements. He’s also your go-to person for comic book discussions.[/team_member][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”small_desktop” animation_type=”default” enable_animation=”true” animation=”grow-in” animation_easing=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”default” column_padding_type=”default”][team_member image_url=”11584″ bio_alt_image_url=”11584″ team_memeber_style=”bio_fullscreen_alt” bio_fullscreen_alt_hide_link_arrow=”true” image_loading=”default” team_member_bio_full_html=”html” hide_link_arrow=”true” name=”Edgar Gonzalez” job_position=”Head Developer & Co-Founder” image_size=”regular”]The other half of our founding team oversees operations in the Dominican Republic. A coding wizard, he’s known for his dedication to lengthy coding marathons and integrating them with strategic branding. As our resident foodie, Edgar is the go-to person for recommendations on the best local eats.[/team_member][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”30px” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all” css=”.vc_custom_1634415872169{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”small_desktop” animation_type=”default” enable_animation=”true” animation=”grow-in” animation_easing=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”default” column_padding_type=”default”][team_member image_url=”11653″ bio_alt_image_url=”11653″ team_memeber_style=”bio_fullscreen_alt” bio_fullscreen_alt_hide_link_arrow=”true” image_loading=”default” team_member_bio_full_html=”html” hide_link_arrow=”true” name=”Mariel Tavares” job_position=”Account Manager” image_size=”regular”]Mariel thrives on meeting new people, making her likely the first friendly face you’ll encounter on this journey with us.
